pacman

Interface Visitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Monster, StrongMonster, WeakMonster

    public interface Visitor
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Visitor' interface allows us to define the relations between pacman and the monsters. Each time a monster encounters a pacman, it checks if it can defeat him. Since pacman has different instances, and each affects the monsters differently, each monster (weak or strong) has a specific implementation indicating if the monster can beat pacman in his current state or not.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean visit(MightyPacMan mp)
      A method that defines the relations between a type of monster and a mighty pacman
      boolean visit(RegularPacMan rp)
      A method that states that the a monster beats the regular pacman
      boolean visit(SuperPacMan sp)
      A method that defines the relations between a type of monster and a super pacman
